title: Large-Classroom-Based Mobile Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Cultivating Collaborative Problem-Solving Abilities in Large-Scale Mobile Learning Environments for Working Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve ≥90% of given mathematical problems within 24 hours using collaborative tools in a mobile environment
Learners can explain mathematical thinking processes with ≥80% accuracy through a peer feedback system
During team-based projects, ≥90% of learners record ≥3 meaningful interactions on the online collaboration platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
